name: Stage Hand (Stegersaurus)
description:
The show's about to start, and you need to setup the props in time! Check your photo and get going!

(Sorry there is only one level and no menu and everything is extremely slapped together! I got my covid vaccine during the first day of the jam and it took up a lot of my attention! Maybe I'll add more later!)

Music
"Le Grand Chase" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
